math.function

Class GeneralFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.function.AbstractFunction
      • math.function.GeneralFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function

    public class GeneralFunction
extends AbstractFunction
    A thin wrapper for a Function. Pass a lambda expression representing the function to the constructor to quickly obtain a concrete AbstractFunction instead of writing a new class that extends AbstractFunction.
